text: Information may be shared with other companies ("Service Providers") to assist us in communicating with or providing our services to you.

Information may be shared with other companies ("Service Providers") to assist us in communicating with or providing our services to you.
These Service Providers may have access to your data in order to provide their required services.

We will use your information to allow you access to your Alleo account, see your organization's data, manage your account and complete any other actions you may take in our software.
When a Alleo User creates an account or is invited to an existing account, certain information is voluntarily given to us.

But in order to comply with your preferences, we'll have to use just one tiny cookie so that you're not asked to make this choice again.
This website stores cookies on your computer.
We will use both session and persistent cookies to help with things like keeping you logged into your Alleo account.

Privacy Policy

Application Data : The system stores data relevant to your companys and teams.
We retain event IDs and user emails for our Google Calendar add-on, and users can request deletion of this data at any time.
